to the 3 time State Champion Cheerleaders!

and their efforts to make a difference in the lives of others! These girls have been collecting bottle caps, which then get recycled into Buddy Benches. Through the support of local sponsors, they have been able to make 5 benches so far and have no plans of stopping anytime soon!
took first place at the Logan View Invitational!
classes are underway under the instruction of Mr. Petersen at APS!

APS is continuing to working closely with the Southeast Nebraska Health Department regarding COVID 19. In addition, we are following the guidelines and advice about the virus shared yesterday by the Governor and the Nebraska Department of Education.
Staff at the Middle School and High School miss our students. Here is the corrected link to the YouTube Video created to show just how much we miss all of you.
Introducing the 2020-2021 Nebraska FBLA State President Lucas Lunzmann!
Auburn Middle and High School students we miss your smiling faces and laughter in the hallways! Stay home, stay safe, and be well! https://youtu.be/d_32wtAULr0
